" Lenovo Group (hereinafter referred to as Lenovo), as an equipment vendor, not only provides hardware equipment but also software services. This phone app named SYNCit (also Android Backup) requires you to provide some personal information so that it can provide you with a better service. The information mainly includes the phone number, IMEI, contacts, photos, SMS, and so on. In order to effectively protect your legitimate rights for your personal information, Lenovo would like to make the following instructions regarding the information collection and use:"

" When you register an account with data backup products, your phone number or IMEI is required. But your phone number or IMEI and other personal information will not be matched and restored. When you select to backup these data, you need to upload the data in your personal phone to Lenovo's servers for backup, so that they can be retrieved or restored as needed later."
" This app is free of charge. In the backup function, when you can click Backup;, it will generate SMS fees which is charged by the operators. This app does not charge any fees."
" When you register this app for the first time, the SMS fees occurred in one key registration function is also charged by the operators."

" Backup/Restore “Contact”, “SMS”, “Call log” is an optional feature and is only available after you choose to use the service. In order to ensure data safety, Lenovo company will take strict security protection measures for servers. Lenovo company will strictly protect the security of such information, including the use of various means of security technology to protect such information from unauthorized access, use or leak. During data restoration, you can rest assured that the existing data in the phone will not be deleted. The network traffic costs during usage are subject to relative regulations of operators. User can delete the backup data on cloud. Your personal data can be backed up to the phone memory or SD card. You can backup/restore your personal data without network connections. All local and cloud backup data adopts encryption processing to ensure that your private data is not viewed or accessed by any unauthorized program. At the same time, Lenovo will not read the contents of user's backup data."
" Lenovo will not make public, edit or disclose your personal information obtained during data backup process without your lawful authority, unless in the following cases:"
" (1)In accordance with relevant national laws and regulations;"
" (2)In the case of an emergency and to safeguard the interests of you and the public;"
" (3)In order to safeguard Lenovo company's trademark right, patent right and any other legal rights;"
" (4)Other legal conditions in which the above information needs to be made public, edited, or revealed."
" In the case of force majeures as follows, Lenovo company assumes no liability. But the company will do its best to maintain your rights and interests and will inform you in time:"
" (3)Network or website shut down due to governmental control;"
" (5)Natural disasters, wars and other unexpected or inevitable events out of reasonable control."

" Your usage of above services including data backup provided by Lenovo company indicates that you understand and agree with the above statement, and authorize Lenovo company to receive the personal information you provide, and store and backup the personal information you provide."

" Based on product development, Lenovo company may modify the privacy statements and privacy policies. We will publish related information at a prominent location of the product or webpage in case of any modification in personal information policies to notice the users in time. Your continued usage of our services indicates you agree to accept the modifications."

Thank you for choosing SYNCit. The synchronization function will collect %1$s, location and other information before proceeding. Synchronization will be carried out over Wi-Fi connection; in the absence of Wi-Fi, mobile data charges may be incurred. An SMS will be generated and sent to you when you select One-Key Login and your mobile service provider may charge you for this SMS, SYNCit does not charge you for any data usage.
Participate in our customer experience program to help us improve our services. A small amount of data usage may be incurred.
The restore operation will overwrite the existing local databases, proceed to restore?

Установка обновления прошивки или Обновление приложений, может привести к потере данных, которые были резервно сохранены на внутреннюю память. Лучше копировать в облако.
Вы беспокоитесь о телефонных номерах, SMS, фотографиях и другой важной информации, боитесь случайно потерять? Воспользуйтесь резервным копированием!
